definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: kill, slay (NH id., [[ואהרג]] MI (1 S. Impf. consec.); Ar. haraja fall into war, conflict, disorder, slaughter; Sab. [[הרג]] fight Os:4, l 17, kill Sab Denkm:24. 25)—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: kill, slay, implying ruthless violence, esp. private violence Ge 4:8, Ge 4:14, Ge 4:15, Ge 4:23, Ge 4:25, Ge 12:12 (all J), Ge 20:11 (E) Ge 26:7, Ge 27:41, Ge 27:42, Ge 34:25, Ge 34:26, Ge 37:20, Ge 37:26 (all J), Ge 49:6 (poem in J), Ex 2:14, Ex 2:14, Ex 2:15 (E), Ex 5:21 (J) Ex 21:14, Ex 23:7 (both JE), Nu 31:19 (P) Ju Jdg 9:5, Jdg 9:18, Jdg 9:24, Jdg 9:24, Jdg 9:56, Jdg 16:2, Jdg 20:5, 1Sa 16:2, 1Sa 22:21, 1Sa 24:11, 1Sa 24:12, 1Sa 24:18, 2Sa 3:30, 2Sa 4:10, 2Sa 4:11, 2Sa 4:12, 2Sa 12:9, 2Sa 14:7, 2Sa 23:21, 1Ki 2:5, 1Ki 2:32, 1Ki 18:12, 1Ki 18:13, 1Ki 18:14, 1Ki 19:1, 1Ki 19:10, 1Ki 19:14, 2Ki 9:31, 2Ki 10:9, 1Ch 7:21, 1Ch 11:23, 2Ch 21:4, 2Ch 21:13, 2Ch 22:8, 2Ch 24:23, 2Ch 24:25, 2Ch 25:3, Ne 4:5, Ne 6:10, Ne 6:10, Zec 11:5, Ps 10:8, Ps 94:6 (‖[[רִצֵּחַ]]); cf. Ju Jdg 8:18, Jdg 8:19, Jdg 8:20, Jdg 8:21, Jdg 9:54, 1Ki 12:27, Is 14:20, 2Ch 22:1, Ne 9:26; so of massacre of Jews planned by Haman Es 3:13, Es 7:4 (both [[לְהַשְׁמִיד]] [[לַהֲרׂג וּלְאַבֵּד]]), and of slaughter of Jews' enemies in defence and revenge Es 8:11 (same combin.) Es 9:6, Es 9:10, Es 9:12, Es 9:15, Es 9:16 cf. v:Es 9:11 (pt. pass. the slain).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: hence of wholesale slaughter after battle Nu 31:7, Nu 31:8, Nu 31:8, Nu 31:17, Nu 31:17 (all P), Jos 8:24, Jos 10:11 (both JE), Jos 13:22 (P), Ju Jdg 7:25, Jdg 7:25, Jdg 8:17, Jdg 9:45, 2Sa 10:18, 1Ki 9:16, 1Ki 11:24, 2Ki 8:12, 1Ch 19:18, 2Ch 28:6, 2Ch 28:7, 2Ch 28:9, 2Ch 36:17, Ez Eze 26:8, Eze 26:11, cf. Ju Jdg 9:26; pt. pass. the slain Is 10:4, Is 14:19 cf. Ez Eze 23:10, Eze 23:47, Eze 37:9, Je 18:21 [[הֲרֻגֵי מָוֶת]] (‖[[מֻכֵּי־חֶרֶב]]); further Ho 9:13, Hb Hab 1:17, Je 4:31, Ez Eze 21:16, Eze 28:9; also of slaughter in a revolt 2Ki 11:8 = 2Ch 23:17.

of God's slaying in judgment (stern and inscrutable), Ge 20:4 (E), Ex 4:23, Ex 13:15, Ex 22:23 (all JE), Am 2:3, Am 4:10, Am 9:1, Am 9:4, La 2:4, La 2:21, La 3:43, Ps 59:12, Ps 78:31, Ps 78:34, Ps 135:10, Ps 136:18 cf. Nu 11:15, Nu 11:15 (JE), Nu 22:33 (J), Is 14:30, Is 26:21 (pass. the slain, so Is 27:7), Je 15:3; fig. [[הֲרַגְתִּים בְּאִמְרֵי־פִָי]] Ho 6:5 (‖[[בַּנְּבִיאִים חָחַבְתִּי]]).
rarely of judicial killing by men (at God's command), Ex 32:27 (JE), Le 20:15, Le 20:16 (H), Nu 25:5 (JE), De 13:10, De 13:10 cf. Ez Eze 9:6 [[תַּהַרְגוּ]] [[לְמַשְׁחִית]].
of killing beasts, Nu 22:29 (J; Balaam's ass), Le 20:15 cf. supr., Is 22:13 (oxen; ‖[[שָׁחׂט]]), [[הִתַּנִּין אֲשֶׁר בַּיׇּ֑ם]] Is 27:1; also of killing vines, by hail Ps 78:47.
of killing by beasts: lions 2Ki 17:25, viper Job 20:16.
quite general is [[עֵת לַהֲרוֹג וְעֵת לִרְפּוֹא]] Ec 3:3.

destroy, ruin [[לֶאֱוִיל יַהֲרָג־כָָּעַשׂ וּפׂתֶה תָּמִית קִנְאָה]] Job 5:2; [[מְשׁוּבַת]] [[פְּתָיִם תַּהַרְגֵם וְשַׁלְוַת כְּ סִילִים תְּאַבְּדֵם]] Pr 1:32; also of those ruined by shameless woman Pr 7:26.—Regular construction is c. acc.; obj. sometimes om., as La 2:21; used abs. Ho 9:13, Je 4:31, Je 15:3, La 3:43, Ez Eze 21:16, Ec 3:3; sq. [[בְּ]] slay among, i.e. some of, 2Ki 17:25, 2Ch 28:6, 2Ch 28:9, Ps 78:31; sq. [[מִן]] (part of), + acc., 1Ch 19:18; sq. dir. obj. c. [[לְ]] † 2Sa 3:30, Job 5:2, Ps 135:11 = Ps 136:19, Ps 136:20 (but in last 3 first obj. is acc.).

definitions.title: Qal 1 a,
definitions.body: [[יֵהָרֵג]] La 2:20 shall priest and prophet be slain in the sanctuary?

definitions.title: Qal 1 b,
definitions.body: 3 fpl. [[תֵּהָרַגְנׇה]] Ez Eze 26:6; also Ez Eze 26:15 [[בֵּהָרֵג הֶרֶג]] ( = [[בְּהֵהָרֵג]]), but LXX Co [[בַּהֲרׂג חֶרֶב]].
